comment: The main text block containing Chinese characters in a traditional vertical layout, including ancient script forms and annotations. The text is arranged in columns from right to left, with headings like '文七' (Seven Characters), '凡皮之屬皆从皮' (All characters related to skin follow the radical '皮'), and various entries with definitions, phonetic notes (e.g., '徒皓切'), and character forms (including ancient scripts like '古文', '籀文').
